# api_spec.Witness proto
# Expected output: trace context headers are preserved regardless of casing
# Other headers are zeroed

method: {
  meta: {
    http: {
      method: "POST"
      path_template: "/api/orders"
      host: "api.example.com"
      obfuscation: ZERO_VALUE
    }
  }
  args: {
    key: "trace-parent-key="
    value: {
      primitive: {
        string_value: {
          value: "00-4bf92f3577b34da6a3ce929d0e0e4736-00f067aa0ba902b7-01"
        }
      }
      meta: {
        http: {
          header: {
            key: "Traceparent"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
  args: {
    key: "trace-state-key="
    value: {
      primitive: {
        string_value: {
          value: "vendor1=value1"
        }
      }
      meta: {
        http: {
          header: {
            key: "TraceState"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
  args: {
    key: "other-header-key="
    value: {
      primitive: {
        string_value: {}
      }
      meta: {
        http: {
          header: {
            key: "X-Custom-Header"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
